sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import * as yup from "yup"; import { yupResolver } from "@hookform/resolvers/yup"; const schema = yup.object().shape({ fname: yup.string().required("its a required field"), lname: yup.string().required(), email: yup.string().required().matches(/[a-z0-9]+@[a-z]+\.[a-z]{2,3}/, "Email should be proper"), pnumber: yup.string().required().matches(/^[0-9]{10}$/, "mobile number should in length 10 and consist number only "), aadhar: yup.string().required().matches(/^\d{ 4}\s\d{ 4}\s\d{ 4}$/, "Should not contain any alphabet or special character ,having space after every 4 digit"), pan: yup.string().required().matches(/[A-Z]{5}[0-9]{4}[A-Z]{1}/, "should follow the standard") }); const SellerForm = () => { const [selectedImage, setSelectedImage] = useState(); const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors }, reset } = useForm({ mode: "onChange", resolver: yupResolver(schema), }); const submit = (data, e) => { reset() } const imageChange = (e) => { if (e.target.files && e.target.files.length > 0) { setSelectedImage(e.target.files[0]); } }; const removeSelectedImage = () => { setSelectedImage(); window.location.reload }; return (<>

{errors.fname?.message}

{errors.lname?.message}

{errors.email?.message}

{errors.pnumber?.message}

Address

Business details

{errors.aadhar?.message}

{errors.pan?.message}

  
{selectedImage && (
)}
   

Bank details

  
{/*
I agree to Bazaar Terms of Service and Privacy.

*/}
) } export default SellerForm
